name: I ITCH AS I CRAVE
description:
What makes you happy in life? How much do you depend on it?

Imagine that your whole existence revolved around that one thing. 

And now imagine that you can lose it. 

The entirety of your existence is dependent on it, so how can you reach it? Who is able to lead you to this HAPPY ending?

Remember this - "FOLLOW THE CAT, SHE KNOWS YOUR HAPPY ENDING".

This is a 2D game set in a 3D space where you will get to choose your dependency in life and follow the path of the one who cannot exist without it. Make sure to not lose the one who is guiding you.

Controls: 

W to move 

Mouse to rotate 

E to maintain the CAT 

ENTER/SPACE to interact

Developers:

Soroush Mohammadzadeh Azari

Mariia Lukashenko
